CustomField.formula:
IF( Partner_Payment_Opp_Product__c == 0, Discount , IF ( Discount = 0, Discount, IF ( Partner_Payment_OP_Bill_through__c = 0 , Discount, IF ( Partner_Payment_OP_Bill_through__c = Discount , 0,
((ListPrice * Quantity ) - ( TotalPrice * (1 / (1 - Partner_Payment_Opp_Product__c )))) / (ListPrice * Quantity)))))
CustomField.label: Customer Discount %
